Uses of Package
authoringEnvironment

  • Packages that use authoringEnvironment 
    Package Description
    authoringEnvironment
    Provides the necessary packages (and therefore classes) to create the entire authoring environment.
    authoringEnvironment.itemWindow
    Provides the necessary classes, concrete and abstract, to build the item window in the authoring environment - the item window allows users to select which sprites (player, enemey, background, etc) will be included in the game.
    authoringEnvironment.mainWindow
    Provides the necessary classes to create the main authoring window, where the user can drag and drop sprites.
    gameElements  
    gameplayer  
    interfaces
